languages.text: "А что может быть лучше и опаснее, чем пустить кровь прислужникам надменного выродка Калькасара? Давно пора было наказать его за дерзость. Если вам доведется схлестнуться в битве — прикончи его этим оружием. И передай привет от Каллигоса Винтерскейла".

traits.locale_text: "А что может быть лучше и опаснее, чем пустить кровь прислужникам надменного выродка Калькасара? Давно пора было наказать его за дерзость. Если вам доведется схлестнуться в битве — прикончи его этим оружием. И передай привет от Каллигоса Винтерскейла".

languages.text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."
languages.original_text: "А что может быть лучше и опаснее, чем пустить кровь прислужникам надменного выродка Калькасара? Давно пора было наказать его за дерзость. Если вам доведется схлестнуться в битве — прикончи его этим оружием. И передай привет от Каллигоса Винтерскейла".

traits.locale_text: "What can be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, finish him off with his weapon. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

"What can be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, finish him off with his weapon. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

"What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

"What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

"What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

"What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

languages.text: «¿Qué podría ser mejor y más peligroso que derramar la sangre de los esbirros de ese arrogante degenerado de Calcazar? Ya iba siendo hora de que alguien le castigase por su insolencia. Si alguna vez se enfrenta a él en combate, use esto para acabar con ese miserable bastardo. Y dele recuerdos de parte de Calligos Winterscale».
languages.original_text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué podría ser mejor y más peligroso que derramar la sangre de los esbirros de ese arrogante degenerado de Calcazar? Ya iba siendo hora de que alguien le castigase por su insolencia. Si alguna vez se enfrenta a él en combate, use esto para acabar con ese miserable bastardo. Y dele recuerdos de parte de Calligos Winterscale».

languages.text: “卡尔卡扎是个傲慢自大的卑鄙小人。能让他的爪牙流血，还有比这更刺激的事情吗？那个傲慢的混蛋早就该尝尝教训了。如果你在战场上遇到他的话，就用这把武器干掉那个卑劣的混蛋。记得告诉他，说卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔向他问好。”
languages.original_text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

traits.locale_text: “卡尔卡扎是个傲慢自大的卑鄙小人。能让他的爪牙流血，还有比这更刺激的事情吗？那个傲慢的混蛋早就该尝尝教训了。如果你在战场上遇到他的话，就用这把武器干掉那个卑劣的混蛋。记得告诉他，说卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔向他问好。”

languages.text: « Quoi de plus jouissif et de plus dangereux que de verser le sang des serviteurs de ce dégénéré de Calcazar ? Ça fait bien longtemps qu'il mérite d'être châtié pour son insolence. Si vous avez l'occasion de l'affronter un jour, achevez ce fumier avec ça et saluez-le bien bas de la part de Calligos Winterscale. »
languages.original_text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi de plus jouissif et de plus dangereux que de verser le sang des serviteurs de ce dégénéré de Calcazar ? Ça fait bien longtemps qu'il mérite d'être châtié pour son insolence. Si vous avez l'occasion de l'affronter un jour, achevez ce fumier avec ça et saluez-le bien bas de la part de Calligos Winterscale. »

languages.text: 「あの高慢で、堕落したカルカサルの部下どもの血を流すことより、危険で良いことがあるだろうか？奴の横柄な態度に罰を与えるには、長い時間が必要だった。もし戦いで奴と対峙することがあれば、この惨めな野郎をこいつで終わらせてやれ。そしてカリゴス・ウィンタースケールによろしくと伝えてくれよ」
languages.original_text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

traits.locale_text: 「あの高慢で、堕落したカルカサルの部下どもの血を流すことより、危険で良いことがあるだろうか？奴の横柄な態度に罰を与えるには、長い時間が必要だった。もし戦いで奴と対峙することがあれば、この惨めな野郎をこいつで終わらせてやれ。そしてカリゴス・ウィンタースケールによろしくと伝えてくれよ」

languages.text: "Was könnte besser und gefährlicher sein, als das Blut der Schergen dieses hochmütigen Degenerierten Calcazar zu vergießen? Er gehört schon lange für seine Dreistigkeit bestraft. Falls Ihr ihm jemals im Kampf begegnet, vernichtet diesen elenden Bastard hiermit. Und grüßt ihn von Calligos Winterzunder."
languages.original_text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

traits.locale_text: "Was könnte besser und gefährlicher sein, als das Blut der Schergen dieses hochmütigen Degenerierten Calcazar zu vergießen? Er gehört schon lange für seine Dreistigkeit bestraft. Falls Ihr ihm jemals im Kampf begegnet, vernichtet diesen elenden Bastard hiermit. Und grüßt ihn von Calligos Winterzunder."

languages.text: "O kibirli soysuz Calcazar'ın hizmetkârlarının kanını dökmekten daha iyi ve tehlikeli ne olabilirdi ki? Küstahlığını cezalandırmak için geç bile kaldık. Onunla savaşta karşılaşırsan acınası şerefsizin işini bununla bitir. Calligos Winterscale'in selamını ilet."
languages.original_text: "What could be better and more dangerous than spilling the blood of that haughty degenerate Calcazar's minions? Punishing him for his insolence was long overdue. If you ever face him in battle, end the miserable bastard with this. And give him Calligos Winterscale's regards."

traits.locale_text: "O kibirli soysuz Calcazar'ın hizmetkârlarının kanını dökmekten daha iyi ve tehlikeli ne olabilirdi ki? Küstahlığını cezalandırmak için geç bile kaldık. Onunla savaşta karşılaşırsan acınası şerefsizin işini bununla bitir. Calligos Winterscale'in selamını ilet."
